pkgmetadata.longdescription: Real-Time PCR Data Sets by Guescini et al. (2008) // Real-time quantitative polymerase chain reaction (qPCR) data by Guescini et al. (2008) doi:10.1186/1471-2105-9-326 in tidy format. This package provides two data sets where the amplification efficiency has been modulated: either by changing the amplification mix concentration, or by increasing the concentration of IgG, a PCR inhibitor. Original raw data files: https://static-content.springer.com/esm/art%3A10.1186%2F1471- 2105-9-326/MediaObjects/12859_2008_2311_MOESM1_ESM.xls and https://static-content.springer.com/esm/art%3A10.1186%2F1471- 2105-9-326/MediaObjects/12859_2008_2311_MOESM5_ESM.xls.
